description: As summer turns to autumn elsewhere in the world, transition your fragrance wardrobe with these new launches. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The Life List: 8 new scents to transition your perfume wardrobe
title_page: The Life List: 8 new scents to transition your perfume wardrobe | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – A new season brings new spoils for fragrance lovers.
As summer turns to autumn in other locales around the world, that means a varied slew of launches from perfume houses – ranging from bright, juicy scents to darker, cosy bouquets – as you transition your scent wardrobe.
